server.model

Class ChatRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.model.ChatRoom

  • public class ChatRoom
extends Object
    ChatRoom class that represents a chatroom containing n Users as participants. It is the responsibility of the calling class to maintain a function mapping from a double value to a ChatRoom object. e.g. The class that deploys ChatRoom objects must devise a method of keeping track of unique instances of ChatRoom objects. The ChatRoom object provides an instance variable 'roomNumber' and relevant setter and getter function to assign a double value to each ChatRoom object. It does not, however, gaurantee uniqueness between different ChatRoom objects. Two ChatRoom objects without an assigned roomNumber will always be equal
    Version:
    F16
    Author:
    jleeong

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChatRoom

        public ChatRoom(HashSet<User> p)
        Primary constructor used to create a ChatRoom object. Initializes the interior Set that keeps track of Users that are participants in this ChatRoom. Calling class must also call .setRoomNumber(double d) to assign room number for room tracking.
        Parameters:
        p - A set of User objects that represent the specific Users that are members of this room

      • ChatRoom

        public ChatRoom(double rn)
        Secondary constructor used to verify ChatRoom existence. Typically used in Server.java when needing to verify existence of certain ChatRoom. Use ChatRoom(Set p) for proper construction of ChatRoom
        Parameters:
        rn - A positive double value that represents the room number.

    • Method Detail

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Returns true if ChatRoom has at least 1 user online, false otherwise

      • setRoomNumber

        public void setRoomNumber(double rn)
        Sets the roomNumber instance variable identifying this ChatRoom object
        Parameters:
        rn - A double value that uniquely identifies each ChatRoom object

      • getRoomNumber

        public double getRoomNumber()
        Returns the roomNumber associated with the ChatRoom

      • getParticipants

        public HashSet<User> getParticipants()
        Function to access set of Users that are participants of this ChatRoom

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)
        Overriden equals() inherited from Object. Will consider any other ChatRoom object equal if it has the same room number.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
